page.title: 06NEW INDUSTRIAL UNITS.
page.content: {New Industry}has provided jobs to replace those lost when the{Textile {Industry,}which was once{Blackburns} biggest employer,went into decline and all but{3 Mills}have now closed.One such new{Industrial Development}is in{ {Cherry Tree,}where new firms such as{ {C.C.T.V.}have moved into{newly built } premises for a variety of{reasons. There are 4 small units:some firms have{bought}their premises,but others only{rent}them because they are{cheap} and offer a{convenient location}on the edge of town,with{easy access}to the road network and their customers. {Thirty}people are employed on the site off{Preston Old Road}and the firms are mostly starting off in business,one was only formed in Nov.84. These units serve as a kind of{Industrial Nursery _a place to{start in}and then perhaps {move on}from to a{larger site}in time.
